title: Can Elder Dragon Spawn only Once per Game?
body: So that when teams are close to achieving victory, allies aren't side tracked by an immaterial objective!?

replies.body: elder spawns after 35 mins. then after taken it has a 10minute cooldown before spawning again.

And when death timers are 50+ seconds and my team already has a baron buff with two enemy carries dead and the enemy mid is wide open for the taking and my team has 2 active GA's and 5 ultimates at the ready. I still see 3 allies go for Elder than the 99.99% guaranteed win, costing us the game.

elder is shit just like the 3 non fire dragons
takes way too fucking long and lasts 45 seconds....
